alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 12 at 7:15AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected or occurring. * WHERE...A portion of western Pennsylvania, including the following county, Beaver. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 715 AM EST, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Conoquenessing Creek is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mainly rural areas of Northern Beaver County. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
